title: Episode 171: Pumpkin Pie Master
itunes:title: Episode 171: Pumpkin Pie Master
description:
Bobo rejects George’s pie. Koloko gets a delayed confession. Gilbert redeems himself by way of pralines. We talk Thanksgiving, conversion camp, Julio the sociopath, and a butthole in the foot. 

Bonus content every Monday:

https://www.patreon.com/TigerBelly
